Pratyeka jibera upara'i tattbabadhayaka rayeche
Ata'eba, manusa yena cinta kare dekhe take ki theke srsti kara hayeche
take srsti kara hayeche sabege sthalita pani hate
eta nirgata haya merudanda o panjarasthira madhya theke
Niscaya tini take phiriye anate saksama
Yedina gopana bisaya pariksita habe
sedina tara kono samarthya thakabe na ebam sahayyakari'o naya
Sapatha asamanera, ya dharana kare brsti
ebam sapatha yaminera, ya bidirna haya
niscaya ala-kura'ana mimansakari bani
Ebam eta nirarthaka naya
Tara bhisana sarayantra kare
ebam ami'o bhisana kausala kari
Ata'eba, kaphiraderake abakasa dina; taderake abakasa dina kichu kalera jan'ya
Apani apanara sumahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna
yini [1] srsti karena [2] atahpara suthama karena
Ara yini nirdharana karena [1] atahpara pathanirdesa karena
ara yini trnadi utpanna karena
pare ta dhusara abarjanaya parinata karena
Sighra'i amara apanake patha karaba, phale apani bhulabena na
allah ya icche karena ta chara [1]. Niscaya tini janena ya prakasya o ya gopaniya
Ara amara apanara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha
Atahpara upadesa yadi phalaprasu haya tabe upadesa dina
ye bhaya kare se'i upadesa grahana karabe
Ara ta upeksa karabe ye nitanta hatabhagya
ye bhayabaha agune dagdha habe
tarapara sekhane se marabe'o na bamcabe'o na
Abasya'i saphalya labha karabe ye parisud'dha haya
Ebam tara rabera nama smarana kare o salata kayema kare
